channel.title: Board Games on Alexander Bulimov: Production Engineer and Scale Modeller
channel.description: Recent content in Board Games on Alexander Bulimov: Production Engineer and Scale Modeller

item.title: Board games are awesome
item.description: I’s been awhile since I wrote anything in my blog, mostly because I was moving to Ireland and was busy at my new job at Big Companyâ„¢. So as I can’t write about all the cool technical things we have there, I’ll try to make this blog less tech-savvy and more personal and fun. As a normal IT person I spend whole working day staring at the computer’s screen. While I love my job and all the high-tech stuff, I feel a great demand of something more physical.
